Articles.Content:
Ladies and gentlemen, I introduce you to the KIAA's first successful SSTO! Christened the Defiance MK I, it is capable of reaching Low Kerbin Orbit (LKO) without jettisoning expensive engines or fuel tanks. The entire craft is reusable, and is capable of gliding back to KSC. Further development will be done to ensure that the Mark II is capable of docking with a refuelling station. The space program has finally achieved SSTO flight after several months of development. Test pilot, Jebediah Kerman is well and healthy. We congratulate him on bringing the Defiance back home. Well done, men!

http://i.imgur.com/b7xwn2N.png

For more pictures, I have a page here photos of previous missions: https://www.facebook.com/kerbalspaceprogramfanpage?fref=ts

I forgot how to use the forums after I stopped frequenting the forums since the forum wipe... Pardon me...

(If you were looking for the F-15C replica I made last year, here's the link, though I'm not sure it's compatible since it was 0.18 when I made it.)

(It's been long since I posted anything )

http://malnu123.imgur.com/all/
